item.title: About Me
item.description: Jiaming Xu My primary interests include Deep Learning, Distributed System, Federated Learning, Distributed Machine Learning, Privacy-Preserving Machine Learning. Email / GitHub ðŸ’» Technical Experience Intern @ Pingan Technology (Dec 2018 - Jun 2019) I was involved in several projects which utilize NLP techniques like word embedding, text classification, named entity recognition to solve real-world problems.
